00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountAdd::CurlAccountAdd()
00029                                           :CurlSubmitForm(){
00030 
00031   response=CAA_UNDEFINED;
00032 
00033   GlobalURI g;
00034 
00035   xml=new xmlAccountList();
00036   this->filename=g.getAdminAdress("addplayer.php");
00037   // Setting the posted data key values
00038   postedData.addKey("name");
00039   postedData.addKey("pwd");
00040   postedData.addKey("timestamp");
00041   postedData.addKey("mail");
00042 
00043 }
00044 
00048 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountAdd::~CurlAccountAdd(){
00049   xml->~xmlAccountList();
00050   xml=NULL;
00051 }

00059 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountAdd::controlBefore(){
00060   bool ret=true;
00061 
00062   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00063   const char* pwd=postedData.getValue("pwd");
00064   const char* mail=postedData.getValue("mail");
00065   const char* errmsg;
00066 
00067   // The . sign
00068   char* dotSign=strchr(mail, '.');
00069   if (dotSign==NULL){
00070     errmsg="The email adress does not contain the 'dot' sign";
00071     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00072     LOGW(errmsg);
00073     ret=false;
00074     response=CAA_MAIL_SIGN_DOT;
00075   }
00076 
00077   // The @ sign
00078   char* atSign=strchr(mail, '@');
00079   if (atSign==NULL){
00080     errmsg="The email adress does not contain the 'at' sign";
00081     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00082     LOGW(errmsg);
00083     ret=false;
00084     response=CAA_MAIL_SIGN_AT;
00085   }
00086 
00087   // The mail is empty
00088   if (strlen(mail)==0){
00089     errmsg="Cannot add a player with empty email adress";
00090     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00091     LOGW(errmsg);
00092     ret=false;
00093     response=CAA_EMPTY_MAIL;
00094   }
00095 
00096   // The mail already in use
00097   if (xml->isMailExisting(mail)){
00098     errmsg="This mail adress is already in use";
00099     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00100     LOGW(errmsg);
00101     ret=false;
00102     response=CAA_MAIL_INUSE;
00103   }
00104 
00105   // The player already exists
00106   if (xml->isAccountExisting(name)){
00107     errmsg="The player already exists";
00108     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00109     LOGW(errmsg);
00110 
00111     ret=false;
00112     response=CAA_EXISTS;
00113   }
00114 
00115   // The password is empty
00116   if (strlen(pwd)==0){
00117     errmsg="Cannot add a player with empty password";
00118     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00119     LOGW(errmsg);
00120     ret=false;
00121     response=CAA_EMPTY_PWD;
00122   }
00123 
00124   // The name is empty
00125   if (strlen(name)==0){
00126     errmsg="The new player's name is empty";
00127     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00128     LOGW(errmsg);
00129     ret=false;
00130     response=CAA_EMPTY_NAME;
00131   }
00132 
00133   postedData.setTimestamp("timestamp");
00134 
00135   if (ret){
00136     response=CAA_SUCCESS;
00137   }
00138 
00139   return ret;
00140 }
00141 
00147 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountAdd::controlAfter(){
00148   xml->refresh();
00149   bool ret=true;
00150  
00151   // Get the values
00152   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00153   const char* pwd=postedData.getValue("pwd");
00154   const char* mail=postedData.getValue("mail");
00155 
00156   tAccountListItem *it=xml->getAccount(name);
00157   const char* itname= it->name;
00158   const char* itpwd= it->password;
00159   const char* itmail= it->mail;
00160 
00161   // control Name
00162   if ((strlen(name)==0)||(strlen(itname)==0)){
00163     LOGW("One of the name is empty, controlAfter failed");
00164     ret=false;
00165 
00166   }
00167   else{
00168     if (strcmp(name, itname)==0){
00169       LOGI("The name is the same");
00170     }
00171     else{
00172       LOGW("The name is not the same");
00173       ret=false;
00174       response=CAA_UNKNOWN;
00175     }
00176 
00177   // control Password
00178 
00179     HashPassword hp;
00180     bool retpwd=hp.compare(pwd, itpwd);
00181     if (retpwd){
00182       LOGI("The password is the same");
00183     }
00184     else{
00185       LOGW("The password is not the same");
00186       LOGW(pwd);
00187       LOGW(itpwd);
00188       
00189       ret=false;
00190       response=CAA_UNKNOWN;
00191     }
00192 
00193     // control Mail
00194     if (strcmp(mail, itmail)==0){
00195       LOGI("The mail adress is the same");
00196     }
00197     else{
00198       LOGW("The mail adress is not the same");
00199       ret=false;
00200       response=CAA_UNKNOWN;
00201     }
00202   }
00203 
00204 
00205   return ret;
00206 }

00244 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlAccountAdd::
00245 getResponse(){
